sentence.Network_en: Echocardiography demonstrated tricuspid chordae tendinae rupture with remarkable tricuspid regurgitation.
sentence.Network_cn: 心脏超音波证实三尖瓣腱索断裂及明显的三尖瓣逆流.

sentence.Network_en: Moderate regurgitation was detected in pulmonic, tricuspid and mitral valves.
sentence.Network_cn: 中度返流仅见于肺动脉瓣 、 尖瓣和二尖瓣.

sentence.Network_en: Results Mitral valve and tricuspid valve prolapse were classed three grades.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果二、三尖瓣脱垂分为三级.

list.abs: 三尖瓣狭窄(tricuspid stenosis)是由于各种原因引起三尖瓣口面积变小。女性多见。病因三尖瓣狭窄最常见的病因是风湿热,风湿性心脏病患者中大约15%有三尖瓣狭窄.
三尖瓣关闭不全（tricuspid insufficiency）罕见于瓣叶本身受累，而多由肺动脉高压及三尖瓣扩张引起。常见于显著二尖瓣病变及慢性 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from tri- 'three' + Latin cuspis, cuspid- 'cusp'

means.word_mean: 1. having three cusps or points (especially a molar tooth);

auth_sentence.content: If a baby with tricuspid atresia doesn't have an atrial septal defect, the baby may need a procedure to create this opening.
